It belongs to the Bromeliaceae family, which includes many epiphytic and terrestrial plants. The plant is characterized by its striking, colorful inflorescences that bloom in vibrant shades of red, orange, and yellow. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Perezia lozanoi is considered a conservation concern.
